entry.title: Punk Rocker, Gotham Horror
entry.summary:
Author: brunetta6

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,771Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 808

Summary: One month after the dimensional rift tore through Metropolis, a reclusive benefactor organizes a charity gala to help with the city’s recovery efforts. Clark Kent – who is, fortunately or unfortunately, freshly single – finds himself personally requested to spend a week in Gotham doing a fluff piece on its very own dark prince. Perry also gives him an… “optional” side mission. Get an interview with the local, cryptid vigilante known as The Batman. Everything that happens after? Only some of it will appear in the history books.

entry.title: One Dance, Just Once
entry.summary:
Author: dropsof_rain

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,866Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: The slow and melodic chatter of the guests, the music that echoes through the building, and the sweet yet savory scent of the food that is out in the open— free for guests to take. Loud yet blurring chatter around, as the bartender pours drinks by the counter. A lively scenery, a place not meant for him. To his surprise, a journalist sits across him. Or, Bruce meets a journalist at a fundraiser who later drags him out of his seat for a dance.

entry.title: the toy story
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,335Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: "I did, uh... I used them," he stutters. "I mean... just... you know." He gestures, the tips of his ears reddening. "By myself." The image hits Bruce like a blow to the stomach: Clark spread out on his bed, naked and hard. A beautiful blush spreading across his body, a flush to his skin. The dildo pushed inside him as Clark cries out with the stretch and the sensation. Clark moaning as he fucks himself. Clark fucking himself. On a toy. On a dildo. In his ass. "Okay," Bruce says, because what else is he supposed to say in a moment like that?   (Or, While investigating Superman, Bruce breaks into Clark Kent's apartment and finds some rather... interesting toys tucked away in his wardrobe. Among them is a double-ended one, and from there Bruce's mind begins to spiral out of control.)

entry.title: A Shadow Of A Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,482Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 664

Summary: Danyal Al Ghul was the younger twin brother of Damian Al Ghul, and destined to be his brother’s right hand man, the ghost that whispered the secrets of others in his ear. Danyal was a dangerous foe to have, one that could look at you and know all of your secrets, one that could vanish right in front of you. So, it was both the saddest and the happiest day when Danyal Al Ghul and his guards disappeared, all thought to be dead, when he was ten.Danny Fenton was the quiet weird kid that the strange, eccentric Drs. Maddie and Jack Fenton found and adopted one day. He was deathly silent, and yet with one look from his piercing blue eyes he could silence you. Even with his weird aura around him, he managed to pull two of the only other weird kids into being his best friends. The three of them were inseparable and seemed to have developed their own silent communications.Danny is weirdly smart about certain things and yet seems to be failing his English class. Danny is forced to write an essay that just so happens to win his English class a week-long trip to Gotham. Surely nothing could go wrong with a group of teenagers from Amity Park and the two adults accompanying them in Gotham?

entry.title: The Devil Wears Prada
entry.summary:
Author: cloudfrog

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,295Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 387

Summary: Gotham's youngest prince, Damian Wayne, has built a thriving career and a carefully crafted image in the fashion industry. But beneath it all, he's been drowning in silence ever since Jon Kent drifted away. Until he meets Leon Devereaux-Burciaga, a bold designer who pulls him into an unexpected marriage proposal. Their connection sparks at Milan Fashion Week, setting the tabloids into a frenzy. Damian sees an opportunity to redefine himself. But when Jon reenters his life, there are choices to make. No powers AU

entry.title: Far too complicated
entry.summary:
Author: ChaosQueen1015

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,088Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: “You - You’re - You’re Bruce Wayne?” Clark finally muttered after a few seconds, “Batman is Bruce Wayne?” Bruce just sighed. “Took you long enough.” “No wonder you’ve never told anyone,” Clark muttered under his breath, trying not to think about how much this complicated things, “You’re one of the most famous men on the planet.” “I’m aware,” Bruce said, still in his stern, Batman voice that Clark was used to. “Can we please stop restating the obvious.” “I - I’m sorry. I’m just -” “- In shock?” Bruce said, taking the words right out of Clark’s mouth, “I suspected as much. I considered keeping the batsuit on as to not have, well, have this happen when you woke up. After the first twelve hours or so, it became increasingly impractical so I decided it would be best to just come clean.” “Wait, hold on, I was out for twelve hours?” ____________________________________________________ Or after Clark gets injured and identities come out, everything gets complicated as Clark liked Bruce before he knew Bruce was Batman and Bruce likes superman long after he figured out superman was Clark. Neither of them know the other likes them. Hijinks ensue

entry.title: Babygirl
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 756Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 261

Summary: "Father, why did Superman call you babygirl?"His father stopped mid-belt-fastening. Richard chuckled from the backseat and swore he'd said "he got you, old man." He frowned at the disrespect, but his father showed no sign of hearing. In fact, he didn't seem very present. He spoke again, "Father, I asked..." "I heard you," his father said, interrupting him, his cheeks slightly red, probably from the heat of the evening's patrol. "You...when did you hear us talking?" "Before the car arrived. You were murmuring among yourselves. The alien was unusually close, way too close," he said, pouting, not understanding why he felt this way. "And he muttered things. Babygirl is the only thing I understood. So, what it means? It's an insult?"   (Bruce regrets all his life choices, while Dick is just enjoying his father's humiliation.)
